response.overview: On the importance of integrity in life, Kamal, a poor engineer, is forced to work as a secretary, while his friend Nazmi pretends to be wealthy in order to swindle the wealthy. Kamal, in dire need of money, is forced to To work with him, Nazmi defrauds a wealthy man, while Kamal loves the wealthy man's daughter, which prompts him to try to save him from Nazmi's clutches.
response.title: الميعاد
